metadata.title: CVE-2023-2879 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: GDSDB infinite loop in Wireshark 4.0.0 to 4.0.5 and 3.6.0 to 3.6.13 allowsdenial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
